body: 1. No you can't. That's only because different analysis types has different result files. The component needs to know the type of the analysis so it calculates the right results. I can see that this can be confusing. Let me see if I can find a better solution for this. 2. Yes! There is a recipe for annual analysis up there. Then use DSParameters and set output units to 1. The results will be annual radiation analysis using Daysim. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/NnMed0rJC6bQpYkbPMtL35N7uhPfuYgj7UW0-8FpM6V1jocd3*JeEv4on0VCf*Qm0exoWlUpZ1aGYFLsGDP-wWzhEm4Jj2jn/annualRadiationAnalysis.png)
